13585.「いやあ ワリーワリー。\n 魔物以外と からむの ひさしぶりでよ。\n つい:
Hahah, sorry 'bout that. It's been a while
since I hung out with someone who wasn't a
monster. I got a bit carried away.

13586.「オレの名は チャムール。\n そして こいつらは オレの仕事仲間だ。:
The name's Chamour. And these here are my
business associates.

13587.「そう……。この オレこそが\n 悪名高き つむじ風の旅団を束ねる\n ヘッドな:
That's right... I'm the head honcho of the
infamous Whirlwind Brigade.

13588.「おいおい。そう構えるなよ。\n アンタも 盗賊なんだろ？\n 同業者同士 仲良:
Oi, oi. No need to be like that. You're a
thief too, ain't ya? Let's get along as
colleagues, yeah?

13589.「アンタが ここに来た理由も 察しがつくぜ。\n おおかた ブデチョのオヤジに\:
I can probably guess why you're here. I bet
old man Budecho asked you to do this for him,
yeah?

13590.「へっへっへ 図星だな？\n 確かに あいつが大事にしていたもんは\n オレがあ:
Heheheh, I'm right, ain't I? Yeah, I got his
precious little somethin' in my care.

13591.「すぐに返してやっても いいんだが……\n それじゃあ イマイチ 面白くねえよな:
I'd give it back to ya... but that wouldn't be
much fun, would it?

13592.「どうだ？ ひとつ アンタのウデ前\n オレに 見せちゃくれないか？\n 義賊っ:
How 'bout this? Why don't ya show me just how
good you are? Ya know, show me what a skilled
robber you are...<yesno><close>

13593.「おいおい。それじゃ いつまでたっても\n ブデチョが探してるもんは 手に入らね:
Oi, oi. In that case, Budecho will never get
what he's lookin' for, yeah?

13594.「よしよし。いい返事だ。\n それじゃあ アンタには ぬすむを使って\n 魔物か:
Good answer. All right, you're gonna have to
use Half-Inch to pinch some treasure from a
monster.

13595.「盗んでくるのは ウェナ諸島の\n ヴェリナード領南にいる <%sEV_QUE_:
I want ya to steal a Golden Scallop from a
Scallop Wallaby in Verinard South in the Wena
Islands.

13596.「ぬすむを成功させ 戦闘に勝ち 黄金ホタテを\n 手に入れたら また ここに戻っ:
If ya successfully use Half-Inch, win the
battle, and get the Golden Scallop, come back
here. I'll give ya what Budecho's lookin' for.

13598.「おう。どうしたんだ？\n オレの言ったことを やってこない限り\n ブデチョが:
Hey. What's the matter? If ya don't do what I
told ya, then I ain't givin' you what
Budecho's lookin' for.

13599.「いいか？ ウェナ諸島の\n ヴェリナード領南で <%sEV_QUE_NAME0:
Remember? Go to Verinard South in the Wena
Islands, and steal a Golden Scallop from a
Scallop Wallaby.

13600.「ぬすむを成功させ 戦闘に勝ち 黄金ホタテを\n 手に入れたら また ここに戻っ:
If ya successfully use Half-Inch, win the
battle, and get the Golden Scallop, come back
here. I'll give ya what Budecho's lookin' for.

13601.「……へっへっへ オレはよ。\n アンタみてえな 正義をふりかざした\n 義賊の:
...Heheheh, ya know... I've been lookin' for
an upstandin' thief like you, pretendin' to be
on the side of justice.

13602.「おっ 早かったじゃねえか。\n どうだ 目当てのもんは 手に入ったか？:
Oh, that was fast. So, did ya get that thing I
asked ya for?

13603.チャムールに 黄金ホタテを 渡しますか？<yesno><close>: Will you give Chamour the Golden Scallop?<yesno><close>

13604.「おいおい。それじゃ いつまでたっても\n ブデチョが探してるもんは 手に入らね:
Oi, oi. In that case, Budecho will never get
what he's lookin' for, yeah?

13606.「ほう なかなか やるじゃねえか。\n こいつは 盗もうったって\n そう簡単に:
Oho, you're pretty good, ain't ya? It's not
easy to steal this thing, ya know.

13607.「アンタ…… いいウデ前だな。\n うちに 入らねえか？\n 義賊なんかしてたん:
You've got quick hands... Why don't ya join
us? It'd be a shame to let that talent as a
thief go to waste.<yesno><close>

13608.「ギャッハッハッハ！ ジョークだよ ジョーク！\n オレは かたぎを気取ったヤツ:
Gahahahah! It was a joke, a joke! There's no
way I'd work with someone who pretends to be a
good person.

13609.「でもよ 約束は守るぜ。\n オルゴールの中身は ブデチョのオヤジに\n ちゃん:
But I'm a man of my word. I'll return the
contents of the music box to old man Budecho.

13610.「しかも 出血大サービスだ。\n このオレが ヤツの所へ行って\n 直接 手渡し:
I'll even do ya one better. I'll return it to
him myself.

13611.「……ブデチョの野郎。\n こいつを見せても ピンとこない盗賊を\n わざわざ:
...That damn Budecho. He went through the
trouble of sendin' this clueless thief who
still doesn't get it...

13612.「ヤツの化けの皮 はがしてやるから\n アンタも 見にこいよ。\n 見ものだぜ～:
I'm gonna peel away his mask, so you should
come see. Ya won't wanna miss it!

13616.「よう 親父 ひさしぶりだな。\n ……だらしなく ブクブク太ってるとこ見ると\:
Yo, it's been a while, pops... Seeing how fat
and sloppy you've gotten, looks like ya
haven't been livin' the good life, yeah?

13617.「おらよっ！ 母さんのオルゴールに入ってた\n これ 返してやらぁ。:
Here! I'm givin' back what ya stashed in mom's
music box.

13618.<if_woman>「自分の正体が バレないよう\n そこの ねえちゃん 使うな:
<if_woman>It was bad taste for ya to use this gal to
hide your identity...<else>It was bad taste for ya to use this guy to
hide your identity...<endif>

13619.「なんとか言ったらどうだ！\n 天下の盗賊王……\n マスク・ド・ムーチョさんよ:
Say somethin', already! The King of Thieves...
Masc de Mucho!!

13620.「……オレは 知ってて\n オルゴールを 奪わせたわけじゃないぜ？\n ただ 母:
...I didn't take the music box because I knew
about that, yeah? I just wanted somethin' to
remember mom by.

13621.「だから あのオルゴールから\n そいつが出てきたときは\n さすがに 自分の目:
So when that thing came out of the music box,
I had to do a double-take.

13622.「その かいとうの仮面は ムーチョの\n トレードマーク……。まさか 自分の父親:
That mask is Mucho's trademark... I never
thought my pops was THE Masc de Mucho!

13624.「さわるんじゃねえ！ この偽善者がっ！！: Don't touch me! Ya damn hypocrite!!

13625.「オレは…… あの日のこと\n 一生 忘れねえからな……！:
I... I'll never forget what happened that
day...!

13628.「アンタが あの伝説の義賊\n マスク・ド・ムーチョだったなんて……。\n 今の:
Is it true that you're really the legendary
Masc de Mucho!?

13629.「やれやれ……。\n 聞かれてしまっては しょうがない。: Good grief... now the cat's outta the bag.

13630.「いかにも ワシが マスク・ド・ムーチョさ。\n ガタラの町長の家に 盗みに入っ:
That's right, I'm Masc de Mucho. Though I've
been out of the trade for years, ever since I
robbed the house of Gatara's mayor.

13631.「もしかして チャムールの言っていた\n あの日ってのは……。マスク・ド・ムーチ:
Could it be that the day Chamour was talking
about... was the day of Masc de Mucho's last
job...?

13632.「ああ そうだ。\n 町長の家に盗みに入った あの日な……。\n ワシは……:
Yeah. The day I robbed the mayor's house...
I...

13633.「ワシは チャムールの母親を\n 見殺しにしてしまったんだ……。: I left Chamour's mother to die...

13635.「それについては もう 何も言いたくはない。\n ともかく……:
I don't want to say anything more about that.
Anyway...

13636.「それ以来 あやつは 義賊を憎むようになった。\n 義を かかげた者が なぜ\n:
Ever since then, he came to hate righteous thieves. He wondered why a man who had done so much for the sake of good had abandoned his
mother to die...

13637.「そして 義賊を 偽善者と呼び\n マスク・ド・ムーチョへの復讐を誓って\n 行:
He called thieves hypocrites, swore revenge on
Masc de Mucho, and disappeared...

13638.「弁解の余地は ない。\n あやつを 悪の道へと進ませたのは\n まぎれもなく:
I have no excuse. I am the one who set Chamour
on this path of evil...

13639.「とんでもないことが わかっちまったね……。\n とりあえず あたいは 酒場に戻:
This is a lot to take in... I'm headin' back
to the tavern, so come find me later.
